pull_request.title: remove qlogo.cn, qlogo.cn is for WeChat’s social avatar.
pull_request.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/4918905fb2b194d23fd413707c9eba85a79fb2e3#commitcomment-90508273 https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/4918905fb2b194d23fd413707c9eba85a79fb2e3#commitcomment-90539906 # Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [x] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? Make the user's avatar load normally. ### Enter the issue address - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/4918905fb2b194d23fd413707c9eba85a79fb2e3#commitcomment-90539906 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/4918905fb2b194d23fd413707c9eba85a79fb2e3#commitcomment-90508273 ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Your comment Remove this link to allow user avatars to load normally. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
Screenshot 2:
### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

2.9.0.1206

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.skyshowtime.com/watch/home

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I guess this will be hard to test for you since the service is only available in some European countries and you need an account to reproduce this. Opening the site works fine but when I try to enter the actual streaming platform (button "Watch on SkyShowtime") I always get this error message:

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot 2022-11-15 at 15 41 56](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22617697/201948090-36f71f8f-6b83-44c8-bb3a-46775502e25b.png)</details>

Without the "AdGuard Annoyances Filter" it works as expected. They might use some tracker to determine your location and block the service if they can't find it or if you're in a country that is not eligible for the service.

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Well not with the AdGuard Annoyances List active 😅 But yes, otherwise I see a cookie dialogue. Thanks!

```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard URL Tracking
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Annoyances
AdGuard Russian
```
Если проблема останется, выключайте фильтр по одному до выявления проблемного.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://ride.lyft.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fride.lyft.com) ### Comment > The issue mainly affects Lyft rideshare links sent via text to track the location of a ride. If someone shared the status of their ride with me, an AdGuard user, the page will show the error in image #1. Refreshing the page or closing the notification doesn't restore functionality. I did not have a second screenshot handy showing behavior with AdGuard off, however I did test it 11/9/22 and shared links worked as intended. This issue has persisted since I initially subscribed to AdGuard sometime in 9/22. No settings have been changed since. > > AdGuard also breaks the "live map" when scheduling a ride too. It's the little map above the "from" and "to" address fields. Instead of showing a detailed map, it's a blank square. Would have created a separate ticket for it but I don't need a ride at this moment. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/m09T4eW.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/f9StHoH.png)

Also, I cannot found any KakaoTalk profile button on other element.

If you want to hide them, please use the following rules:
```adblock
sorishop.com##.mobile > div[style*="border-radius:"]
```

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
